definition: A physical representation of monetary value, typically made of paper or polymer, used as a medium of exchange in financial transactions. It is commonly utilized for purchasing goods and services, as well as storing and transferring wealth.

examples.german: Er bezahlte mit einer gefälschten Banknote.
examples.english: He paid with a counterfeit banknote.

examples.german: Die Banknoten sind in verschiedenen Stückelungen erhältlich.
examples.english: The banknotes are available in various denominations.

examples.german: Die Banknoten sind mit modernster Technologie gesichert.
examples.english: The banknotes are secured with state-of-the-art technology.
